name: Bootstrap
details: Build fast, responsive sites with Bootstrap Powerful, extensible, and feature-packed frontend toolkit. Build and customize with Sass, utilize prebuilt grid system and components, and bring projects to life with powerful JavaScript plugins.Get started any way you want : npm i bootstrap@5.2.2 CDN_LINK:css:https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.2.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css js:https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.2.2/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min. Bootstrap Icons:Free, high quality, open source icon library with over 1,600 icons. Include them anyway you like—SVGs, SVG sprite, or web fonts. Use them with or without Bootstrap in any project. need to install: npm i bootstrap-icons

name: Tailwind
details: Rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML.A utility-first CSS framework packed with classes like flex, pt-4, text-center and rotate-90 that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup.Tailwind CSS works by scanning all of your HTML files, JavaScript components, and any other templates for class names, generating the corresponding styles and then writing them to a static CSS file.It's fast, flexible, and reliable — with zero-runtime.The simplest and fastest way to get up and running with Tailwind CSS from scratch is with the Tailwind CLI tool. The CLI is also available as a standalone executable if you want to use it without installing Node.js.step-1:Install Tailwind CSS Install tailwindcss via npm, and create your tailwind.config.js file. npm install -D tailwindcss px tailwindcss init......step:2::Configure your template paths dd the paths to all of your template files in your tailwind.config.js file.....html,js .Add the Tailwind directives to your CSS @tailwind base,tailwind components,@tailwind utilities .than you can run your projects

name: Firebase

name: Github

name: Components
details: Web Components is a suite of different technologies allowing you to create reusable custom elements — with their functionality encapsulated away from the rest of your code — and utilize them in your web apps.The most popular, free and open-source Tailwind CSS component library : (i)daisyUI, (ii)TailBlock ,(iii) Merak Ui, (iv) Lofi UI, (v)Tailwind Components (vi)Tailwind Toolboxs.....
